if django_mailing:
                send_mail(subject, message, sender, [recipient])

            else:
                command = 'mail -s "{subject}" -r {sender} {recipient}'.format(
                    subject=subject,
                    sender=sender,
                    recipient=recipient,
                )
            if django_mailing:
                send_mail(subject, message, sender, [recipient])

            else:
                command = 'mail -s "{subject}" -r {sender} {recipient}'.format(
                    subject=subject,
                    sender=sender,
                    recipient=recipient,
                )

                writer = os.popen(command, 'w')
                writer.write(message)
                writer.close()

        if self.verbosity >= 2:
            # write only a header
            self.stdout.write('-' * 40 + '\n')
            self.stdout.write('To: {}\n'.format(recipient))
            self.stdout.write('Subject: {}\n'.format(subject))
            self.stdout.write('From: {}\n'.format(sender))
pattern_desc: Potential command injection due to os.system usage.
